articles.author: KAELA MALIG, GMA News
articles.title: Pulse Asia: Television is still leading source of information on politics for Filipinos - GMA News Online
articles.description: The nationwide survey, conducted via face-to-face interviews of 2,400 Filipino adults from September 6 to 11, showed that 91% of respondents get their political news from the television, with 82% citing national television and 25% citing local television.
articles.content:
Television remains the Filipinos' leading source of information on the country's government and politics, according to a September Pulse Asia poll.

articles.title: Thailand to end quarantine for some vaccinated visitors from Nov, says PM - TODAYonline
articles.description: BANGKOK — Thailand will end coronavirus quarantine requirements for vaccinated visitors from 10 low-risk countries starting Nov 1, prime minister Prayuth Chan-ocha said on Monday (Oct 11), as the Southeast Asian nation tries to revive its pandemic-hit economy.
